translations: 1. 喘息，喘气：因劳累、兴奋或紧张而发出喘息声。
· After running up the stairs, he whooped for breath.
跑上楼梯后，他喘息着喘气。
2. 大声叫喊，欢呼：发出高声的叫喊或欢呼。
· The crowd whooped with excitement when the team scored.
当球队得分时，人群兴奋地欢呼。

sentences.sentence: When she passed under the arch leading out of the park, Mira whooped with delight.
sentences.translation: 从通向公园外的拱门下走过时，米拉高兴地喊叫起来。
